datafield.subfield: thob yig nor bu'i phreng ba
gsan yig/_ngag dbang kun dga' theg chen dpal 'bar
Sde dge par khang chen mo,
Printed from blocks carved at sde dge par khang chen mo; copy made available from the library of tai si tu rin po che at shes rab gling, kangra, himachal pradesh, india.

Record of teachings received by Sakya Trichen 42 (1945- ). Printed from woodblocks carved at the Degge Printery. Acquired from the library of Tai Situ Rinpoche at Sherab Ling Monastery in Himachal Pradesh, India. The first volume is missing.
ngag dbang kun dga' theg chen dpal 'bar/ sa skya khri chen 42 ngag dbang kun dga' theg chen dpal 'bar, 1945.
bla ma 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi ye shes skus dngos su rjes su bzung ba mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams lhun grub legs pa'i 'byung gnas kyi gsung 'bum
gsung thor bu/_bsod nams lhun grub
Sde dge par khang chen mo,
Printed from blocks carved at sde dge par khang chen mo; copy made available from the library of tai si tu rin po che at shes rab gling, kangra, himachal pradesh, india.

Miscellaneous Writings by Sakya scholar Lowo Kenchen Sonam Lhundrub (1456-1532). Reproduced from the Degge Printery blockprints. Made available by Tai Situ Rinpoche at Sherab Ling Monastery in Himachal Pradesh, India.
bsod nams lhun grub// glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub/, 1456? 1441?-1532? 1525?
rgyal rabs rnams kyi byung tshul gsal ba'i me long chos 'byung
rgyal rabs gsal ba'i me long
Printed from blocks carved at sde dge par khang chen mo; copy made available from the library of tai si tu rin po che at shes rab gling, kangra, himachal pradesh, india.
rgyal rabs gsal ba'i me long ngam chos 'byung gsal ba'i me long /

History of royal chronicles by Sakya Trichen 14 Lama Dampa Sonam Gyaltsen (1312-1375). Reproduced from Degge Printery blockprints. Made available by Tai Situ Rinpoche at Sherab Ling Monastery in Himachal Pradesh, India.
bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan, 1312-1375
ston mchog thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa'i dbang po'i skyes rabs gsal bar brjod pa brgya lnga bcu pa nor bu'i phreng ba
thub pa'i dbang po'i skyes rabs gsal bar brjod pa brgya lnga bcu pa/
Sde dge par khang chen mo,
Printed from blocks carved at sde dge par khang chen mo; copy made available from the library of tai si tu rin po che at shes rab gling, kangra, himachal pradesh, india.
ston pa'i skyes rabs brgya lnga bcu pa nor bu'i phreng ba/ par byang smon tshig

History of Buddhist genealogies by Sakya Trichen 14 Lama Dampa Sonam Gyaltsen (1312-1375). Reproduced from Degge Printery blockprints. Made available by Tai Situ Rinpoche at Sherab Ling Monastery in Himachal Pradesh, India.
'jam dbyangs blo gter dbang po/ ngor pa dpon slob blo gter dbang po, 1847-1914
dam pa'i chos rin po che 'phags pa'i yul du ji ltar dar ba'i tshul gsal bar ston pa dgos 'dod kun 'byung
Sde dge par khang chen mo,
Printed from blocks carved at sde dge par khang chen mo; copy made available from the library of tai si tu rin po che at shes rab gling, kangra, himachal pradesh, india.

History of the spread of Buddhism in India by Jonang Jetsun Taranatha (1575-1634). Reproduced from Degge Printery blockprints. Made available by Tai Situ Rinpoche at Sherab Ling Monastery in Himachal Pradesh, India.
tA ra nA tha/ jo nang rje btsun tA ra nA tha, 1575-1634
rgya nag gi yul du dam pa'i chos dar tshul gtso bor bshad pa blo gsal kun tu dga' ba'i rna rgyan
Sde dge par khang chen mo,
Printed from blocks carved at sde dge par khang chen mo; copy made available from the library of tai si tu rin po che at shes rab gling, kangra, himachal pradesh, india.

History of Buddhism in China by Mongolian scholar Gonpo Kyab (18th cent.). Kyab sent a manuscript of the Rgya nag chos ‘byung to Situ Panchen (1700-1774), a contemporary scholar in Tibet. Reproduced from Degge Printery blockprints. Made available by Tai Situ Rinpoche at Sherab Ling Monastery in Himachal Pradesh, India.
mgon po skyabs/ mi dbang mgon po skyabs, 17uu.
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam chen gsung ngag rin po che'i bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar glegs bam
lam 'bras bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar
Sde dge par khang chen mo,
Printed from blocks carved at sde dge par khang chen mo. copy made available from the library of tai si tu rin po che at shes rab gling, kangra, himachal pradesh, india.

Biographies of the lives of gurus in the Sakya lamdre transmission lineage. Reproduced from seven volumes of blockprints carved at Degge Printery. Made available by Tai Situ Rinpoche at Sherab Ling Monastery in Himachal Pradesh, India. Volume 01 of Situ Rinpoche's biography is missing.
bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar/

datafield.subfield: sgom sde nam mkha' rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i dbu ma'i spyi don zla ba'i dgongs rgyan
sgom sde dbu ma'i spyi don
dbu ma'i spyi don zla ba'i dgongs rgyan
Dga' ldan byang rtse thos bsam nor gling grwa tshang,
Instructions on Madhyamaka by Gomdewa Namkha Gyaltsen (1532-1592), an abbot of Gyuto Tantric Monastery.
spyi don exegesis of the general meaning/
nam mkha' rgyal mtshan/ sgom sde ba nam mkha' rgyal mtshan, 1532-1592
dpal ldan shar pa mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang rin chen mi 'gyur rgyal mtshan gyi gsung 'bum rdo rje'i tshig rkang gi dkar chag nor bu'i bum bzang don gnyis dpal ster
Sde dge par khang chen mo :

shar chen rin chen mi 'gyur rgyal mtshan gyi gsung 'bum dkar chag nor bu'i bum bzang don gnyis dpal ster/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ 'jam mgon tshul khrims lhun grub la gsol ba 'debs pa byin rlabs drod 'bar/ rgya bod mkhas grub rnams la bstod pa/ tshe lha'i gsol 'debs/ rje btsun rdo rje dbyangs can ma bstod pa blo gsal blo gros kha 'byed/ chos srung gsol 'debs tshig gi dung chen/ bla ma rnam gnyis la bstod pa/ dge slong bstan 'dzin gyi dris lan zin bris/ chos rje ngag dbang shes rab kyi dris lan/ chos gtam yan lag brgyad ldan chu/ chos pa kun la phan pa'i gtam/ rang skyon mun pa sel ba'i tshig gi sgron me/ rang skyon khung bu 'dru ba'i tshig gi tog rtse/ kun phan pad+ma 'dzum byed/ grwa rgyun rnams la phan pa'i gtam/ chos pa spyi dang btsun chung rnams la phan pa'i gtam/ dge stobs 'phel thabs/ bkra shis dpal bzang dris len/ khro phu bla mar gdams pa/ lho 'brug pa'i sde srid la zhu yig snying gi gros 'debs/ 'phan la 'dri rgyu'i zin bris/ chos khrims la gdams pa/ 'phan la 'bru rgyu'i yi ge/ rgyun gyi nyams len rang gis rang la gros btab rnam mkhyen bgrod pa'i them skas/ bsgom don gong ma'i gsung bshad/ sangs rgyas kun bzang gi dris lan/ mkhas grub tshul khrims rin chen la bstod pa/ zhu chen sku bstod ka sogs can/ zhu chen zhabs brtan/ tshe lha'i gsol bdebs/ thub bstod/ chos rje ye shes chos dbang dris lan/ bsam bzang bsod nmas rgyas byed/ chang rag nyes dmigs sku tshe ring don ma/ grub mtha' dge ba'i rgyu can/ phan 'dod tshig gi sgron me don skyon mun sel/ bra'u bla dgon la gdams pa/ yul gyi ming la 'pho rgyu med na ma/ zin bris sna tshogs/ phyag rdor bstod pa phrin bcol sogs/ dmag zor bsang bsdus/ spyan gzigs 'dod gsol/ drung chos rje'i dbu thod yid bzhin nor bu'i dkar chag shes ldan bzang ngan rnam dbye ya rabs 'phel thabs/ mi gzhi bzang ngan 'byed pa/ dkon mchog rjes dran yig mkhan bdud rtsi/ dpal ldan sa skya'i bstod pa/ dam tshig srung sdom skyon yon/ gtan gyi bde skyid kyi lo legs thabs/ dug blo spong byed ma/ kun tu dge thabs/ dga' skyid sa bon 'phel thabs/ stong nyid brgal len dang 'dod don 'grub pa'i gegs sel/ 'dod don 'grub pa'i gegs sel/ chos mthun dge legs bya ba 'phel byed/ khro zil khrom la bstod pa/ gzhi bdag la bsangs nyung ngu/ kha char bcad 'bab gyi spang blang bstan pa dar byed/ dam tshig gtsang thabs bshad pa dngos grub char 'bebs/ dam tshig gtsang thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i lam ston/ mkhas pa'i gsung la the tshom skyes pa'i gtam/ tshul khrims dpal bzang bstod pa/ bla ma lha rjer gdams pa/ lha khang bzhengs pa'i phan yon/ mna' mthu dkar thab dmar gzhob nyes dmigs/ nyal ldang gi gdams pa/ a ti sha la gsol ba 'debs pa/ mkhan po sangs rgyas ye shes zhal gzigs/ sangs rgyas rin chen bsangs yig zhu lan/ sde dge'i dri med bshags rgyud par byang / skyabs 'gro'i don 'grol/ bar chad zhi thabs/ dpal ldan sa skya pa la gsol ba 'debs pa skal ldan dad pa 'phel byed/ dpal ldan chos skyong la bstod pa/ mkhas grub tshul khrims rin chen la bstod pa/ tshul khrims kyi yon tan/ shes rab rin chen la lha rgyan phul 'bras/ shes rab rin chen la gdams pa/ dgra ri dwags kyi nyes dmigs lha bsnyen bkur phan yon sogs/ zhal gzigs ngo mtshar can/ klu sdings lha bya dgon gsar smon lam/ sa ris pa dga' byed/ gnas mjal phan yon/ dge bcu spyod byed/ ma Ni che 'don ma/ chos smon nyi ma rku jag mun sel/ rang la gdams pa blo thugs bde byed/ byams pa bsod nams bzang po'i zhabs brtan/ don gyi smon lam/ rten 'brel ldan pa'i bkra shis/ bkra shis rgyun 'phael/ shar pa mkhan rin po che mi 'gyur rgyal mtshan gyi rnam thar smra ba'i seng ge sa skya pa kun dga' blo gros kyi gsung rdo rje sgra ma'i mchod pa/ dpal shar pa mkhan rin po che rdo rje 'chang rin chen mi 'gyur rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa/ smra ba'i seng ge'i gsung rdo rje sgra ma'i mchod pa rgyas par spros pa zhing khams rgya mtsho'i mchod sprin/ brda dag snang brnyan gsal byed me long /
Collected Works by Ngor Khenchen 37 Mingyur Gyaltsen (b. 1717) of Luding Labrang at Ngor Evam Chode Monastery. This volume was printed from blockprints at the Degge Printery.
mi 'gyur rgyal mtshan/ ngor mkhan chen 37 mi 'gyur rgyal mtshan, 1717.
'jam dbyangs blo gter dbang po'i bka' 'bum
pod ka (1) pod kha (2) pod ga (3) pod nga (4) pod ca (5) pod cha (6)

Collected Works by Jamyang Loter Wangpo (1847-1914), a Sakya and Rime figure from Ngor Tartse Monastery. Includes several commentaries on Mahayana classics as well as writings on the Lamdre Lobshe transmissions. See also his compilations, the Rgyud sde kun btus [W27883] and the Sgrub thabs kun btus [W23681].
'jam dbyangs blo gter dbang po/ ngor pa dpon slob blo gter dbang po, 1847-1914
rgyal ba'i sras po thogs med chen po'i bka' 'bum/
Sde dge par khang chen mo,

Collected Works by Gyalse Tokme Zangpo (1295-1369), the 73rd Lamrim lineage holder. This volume was reproduced from blockprints at Degge Printery that were carved during the rule of Kunga Trinle Gyatso.
thogs med bzang po dpal// rgyal sras thogs med bzang po/, 1295-1369
dbus 'gyur chos sde chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs tshogs chen dang dpal ldan bkra shis sgo mang grwa tshang bcas kyi tshogs 'don chos spyod kyi rim pa bskal bzang mgrin rgyan
Dbus ʾgyur chos sde chen po Dpal ldan ʾBras-spuṅs Tshogs-chen daṅ Dpal ldan Bkra-śis Sgo-maṅ Grwa-tshaṅ bcas kyi tshogs ʾdon chos spyod kyi rim pa bskal bzaṅ mgrin rgyan źes bya ba bźugs so.
Collection of liturgical writings from Drepung Gomang Monastic College.
sgo mang grwa tshang ('bras spungs) 'bras spungs sgo mang grwa tshang/
dge lugs pa dga' ldan pa/
gsang chen rig 'dzin gyi sde chen po dpal ldan stod rgyud grwa tshang gi gsung rgyun chos spyod nyer mkho 'ga' zhig phyogs gcig tu bkod pa yid 'phrog nor bu'i do shal
the collected ritual texts used in the rgyud-stod grwa-tshan
the collected ritual texts used in the rgyud-stod grwa-tshan

Gsaṅ chen rig ʾdzin gyi sde chen po Dpal ldan Stod rgyud Grwa tshaṅ gi gsuṅ rgyun Chos spyod ñer mkho ʾgaʾ źig phyogs gcig tu bkod pa yid ʾphrog nor buʾi do śal :the collected ritual texts used in the Rgyud-stod Grwa-tshaṅ.
pod ka pa/（1） pod kha pa/（2） pod ga pa/（3） pod nga pa/（4） pod ca pa/（5）
Collection of religious instructions from Gyuto Monastic College.
dge lugs pa dga' ldan pa/
bkra shis lhun po'i rgyud pa grwa tshang gi rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi 'don cha'i rim pa
the collected ritual texts used in the rgyud-pa grwa-tshan (tantric college) of bkra-sis-lhun-po monastery
bkras lhun rgyud pa grwa tshang gi chos spyod
the collected ritual texts used in the rgyud-pa grwa-tshan (tantric college) of bkra-sis-lhun-po monastery
Bkra śis lhun po'i Rgyud pa Grwa tshaṅ gi rig sṅags 'chaṅ ba rnams kyi 'don cha'i rim pa bźugs so.
Bkra śis lhun po'i Rgyud pa Grwa tshaṅ gi rig sṅags 'chaṅ ba rnams kyi 'don cha'i rim pa bźugs so.
Bkra śis lhun poʾi Rgyud pa Grwa tshaṅ gi rig sṅags ʾchaṅ ba rnams kyi ʾdon chaʾi rim pa :the collected ritual texts used in the Rgyud-pa Grwa-tshaṅ (Tantric College) of Bkraśis-lhun-po Monastery.

Collection of ritual texts from Tashi Lunpo Monastic College.

the collected works of liturgy of the gnas-chun rdo-rje-sgra-dbyans-glin monastery
pod dang po/(1) pod gnyis pa/(2) pod gsum pa/(3)
Collection of liturgical writings from Nechung Dorje Drayang Ling.
dge lugs pa dga' ldan pa/

ʾDul baʾi bslab bya chen mo /ʾDul-ʾdzin Grags-pa-rgyal-mtshan gyis mdzad pa bźugs so.
'bras grong snga 'gyur rig gzhung slob gnyer khang gi yan lag gsung rab rgyun spel par khang,

rab byung gi gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor bsdus sdom pa thob pa mi nyams par srung ba gso sbyong gi gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor bsdus dbyar gyi gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor bsdus dgag dbye'i gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor bsdus gos gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor bsdus ko lpags kyi gzhi'i bslab bya mdor bsdus sman gi gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor bsdus las byed pa'i gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor bsdus gnas mal gyi gzhi'i skabs kyi bslab bya mdor msdus par byang smon tshig
Work on Vinaya rules of monastic discipline by the Geluk author, Duldzin Drakpa Gyaltsen (1374-1434), founder of Tsunmo Tsel Monastery in Taktse Dzong, central Tibet.
'dul ba'i cho ga monastic ordination manuals/
grags pa rgyal mtshan/ 'dul 'dzin grags pa rgyal mtshan, 1374-1434
smad rgyud grwa tshang gi chos spyod rgyas pa
the collected rituals and explanatory texts used by the monks of tantric college
gsang chen dpal ldan smad rgyud grwa tshang gis nyams bzhes chos skor gyi rim pa
the collected rituals and explanatory texts used by the monks of tantric college
pod dang po/（1） pod gnyis pa/（2） pod gsum pa/（3） pod bzhi pa/（4） pod lnga pa/（5） pod drug pa/（6） pod bdun pa/（7） pod brgyad pa/（8） pod dgu pa/（9） pod bcu pa/（10） pod bcu gcig pa/（11）
Collected liturgies and explanations of Geluk Megyu Tantric College. Compiled from blockprints and manuscripts in Karnataka, India, by Ngakrampa Lobzang Gelek and Ngakrampa Chime Dorje.
dge lugs pa dga' ldan pa/
bde chen pad+mo chos lding gi bstan srung rgya mtsho'i bskang 'phrin nag 'gros chu 'babs su bkod pa dgra bgegs gzhom pa tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs
rituals for the propitiation of the protective deities involked by the monastery of bde-chen padma-chos-sdins, a monastery of the bo-don tradition in spo ron, western tibet
rituals for the propitiation of the protective deities involked by the monastery of bde-chen padma-chos-sdins, a monastery of the bo-don tradition in spo ron, western tibet
"reproduced from a rare manuscript belonging to a monk of the tradition.".

dkar chag bde chen pad+ma chos lding gi bstan srung rgya mtsho'i skang 'phrin/ chos bdag chen po bkra shis 'od 'bar gyi bskang ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mngon rtogs tshigs su bcad pa/ pad+ma chos lding gi gtor bsngo/
Collected writings on ritual for the propitiation of protector deities by the Bodng monastery, Dechen Padma Choding in Porong.
bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud...
Sde dge par khang chen mo,
Impressions from the sde dge blocks carved in 1733 at the order of the ruler bstan pa tshe ring on the basis of the late 17th century po ta la print.

On the science and study of Tibetan medicine. Made from reproductions of Degge Printery woodblocks carved in 1733, based on late 17th century Potala prints at the order of the King of Degge, Tenpa Tsering (1678-1738).
rituals for the offering of bsans in propitiation of the local and mountain deities
rituals for the offering of bsans in propitiation of the local and mountain deities
"reproduced from a rare manuscript from the library of bla-ma chos-grags-rgya-mtsho.".
gser skyems dang bsangs yig dgos 'dod kun 'grub sa bsang gi tho yig bla bslu 'chi bdag g.yul las rgyal ba'i go mtshon

Instructions on ritual offerings for the propitiation of local mountain deities. Written by Sakya Trichen 20 Dakchen Gyagarba Sherab Zangpo (1436-1494) and other Sakya writers. Reproduced from a manuscript in the library of Sakya Trichen 20 Dakchen Gyagarba Sherab Zangpo.
shes rab rgyal mtshan/ rgya gar ba shes rab rgyal mtshan, 1436-1494
dpal stag lung pa chen po'i ring lugs kyi bsang gsol chen mo
the largest version of the rituals for the offering bsans of the stag-lun bka'-brgyud-pa tradition
the largest version of the rituals for the offering bsans of the stag-lun bka'-brgyud-pa tradition
"reproduced from rare manuscripts from the library of takpa gyaltsen of riwoche.".
Collection of instructions for ritual offerings in the Taklung Kagyu order. Reproduced from a manuscript in the library of Drakpa Gyeltsen of Riwoche.
karma pa sgar bsangs chen mo
the collected rituals for the offering of bsans of the karma-pa sgar
sgar bsangs chen mo dang gtor bsngo nyer mkho'i rigs
the collected rituals for the offering of bsans of the karma-pa sgar
Karma pa Sgar bsans chen mo :the collected rituals for the offering of bsaṅs of the Karma-pa Sgar /by the 15th Rgyal-bdaṅ Karma-pa Mkhaʾ-khyab-rdo-rje and other masters.
"reproduced from a collection of prints from blocks of dpal-spuns and lha-thog.".

tshogs bsags chos spyod kyi rim pa skal ldan thar par bgrod pa'i lam bzang / zung 'jug don gyi brgyud pa'i rim pa la gsol ba 'debs pa/ sgrub brgyud karma kaM tshang gi sngon 'gro/ sgar bsangs chen mo yid bzhin dbang rgyal dngos grub char 'bebs/ bsangs mchod bdud rtsi sprin phung bkra shis char 'bebs/ rgyun gyi bsangs mchod dge legs sprin phung/ mgon po legs ldan gyi dgra chos dgra bla bcu gsum gyi bsangs mchod/ legs ldan dgra bla'i bsangs mchod bsdus pa/ sde brgyad bcos thabs gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyi mdzad pa sde brgyad gser skyems/ rtsa gsum bka' srung bcas kyi gtor bsngos/ dpal mgon legs ldan gyi bzlog pa/ rgyun khyer gyi lus sbyin bsdus pa/ bka' 'gyur ro cog gi snying po bsdus pa/ gtsug tor dkar mo'i bsgom bzlas bde can zhing du bgrod pa'i gdams pa/

Collection of instructions for ritual offerings by Karmapa 15 Khakyab Dorje (1870/1871-1921/1922) and other writers. Reproduced from a collection of blockprints from Pelpung Monastery and the Lhatok region.
karma 'i sgar chen traveling encampment of the karma pa lama/
karma bka' brgyud pa kaM tshang bka' brgyud pa/
mkha' khyab rdo rje/ karma pa 15 mkha' khyab rdo rje, 1870/1871-1921/1922
ston thun chen mo of mkhas-grub dge-legs-dpal-bzan and other texts on madhyamika philosophy
zab mo stong pa nyid de kho na nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos
dbu ma stong thun chen mo/
zab mo stong pa nyid de kho na nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos
Stoṅ thun chen mo of Mkhas-grub Dge-legs-dpal-bzaṅ :and other texts on Madhyamika Philosophy /edited by Lha-mkhar Yoṅs-ʼdzin Bstanpa Rgyal mtshan.
Lha mkhar yongs 'dzin bstan pa rgyal mtshan,

dkar chag zab mo stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos skal bzang mig 'byed/ dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal gyi mtha' bzhi'i skye ba 'gog pa'i stong thun zhang zhung pa phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba chos grags pa'i dpal gyis zin bris su mdzad pa/ rten 'brel bstod pa legs bshad snying po zhes bya ba'i bsdus don snying po mchog zhi lhag gnyis kyi dka' gnas grub rje'i gsung bzhin rdo rje 'chang zhang zhung pa chen pos zin bris su mdzad pa/ zab mo dbu ma'i lta khrid mthaaar 'dzin kun sel/ lta mgur a ma ngos 'dzin rtsa 'grel/ lta ba'i mgur gyi 'grel pa tshig gi sgron me/

Works on Madhyamaka by Ganden Tripa 03 and Panchen Lama 01 Khedrub Gelek Pelzang (1385-1438) with contributions also by Zhang Zhung Chowang Drakpa (1404-1469/1471), Ganden Tripa 08 Monlam Pelpa (1414-1491) and Jamyang Zhepa 02 Konchok Jigme Wangpo (1728-1791).
dge legs dpal bzang/ mkhas grub rje dge legs dpal bzang, 1385-1438
chos dbang grags pa/ zhang zhung chos dbang grags pa, 1404-1469/1471
dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po/ 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa 02 dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po, 1728-1791
calendrical calculation and astrological texts from ladakh
Calendrical calculation and astrological texts from Ladakh.
"reproduced from manuscripts in the possession of emchi tashi wangyal.".

byed grub rtsis kyi bstan bcos mkhas pa'i spyod yul rtsis kyi legs bshad 'chi med 'dod 'jo blo gsar yid kyi bdud rtsis las dus sbyor 'di bi chos kyi dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje'i lags pa'i dus sbyor ngo mtshar bltas chog gsal ba'i sgron me grub rtsis rnam dag legs bshad las khyim sleb sgang tshad dbugs thob legs nyer mkho'i man ngag mnam myong ma rgya mtsho las grub rtsis rnam par dag pa'i re'u mig skal ldan mkhas pa'i mu tig gi do shal rin chen yi bang mdzod kyi kyi lde mig rnam dag grub pa'i gza' nyi rtag long rgya mtsho las 'grub rtsis rnam dag gi zla rkang cha shas kyi re'u mig 'byung lugs dpal ldan byed pa'i skal dru'i re'u mig rkang drug bzhi lngas sbyangs pa dpal ldan byed pa'i gza' nyi rtag long dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag khyim slebs kyi dngos 'dzin gsal ba'i me long dpal dus 'khor las man ngag sgang tshad kyi zla grangs tshes grangs 'dod cha lnga cha bcas kyi bya ra ba dpal dus 'khor lo'i man ngag las dbugs thob dbyar dgun nyi ldog ri shi phag zhag bcas kyi zla grangs tshes grangs 'dod cha lnga cha bzas kyi bya ra drag gza' gsum las mig dmar gyi dal dag zhag rtsis re'u mig bcu gnyis su spel ba mkhas pa dang blo gsar spro ba skye ba drag gza' gsum gyi rkang 'dzin dang zhi gza' gnyis kyi dal dag re'u mig legs pa cig gza' lnga'i myur ba'i re'u mig mkhas pa dgyes shing blo gsar rigs pa dpun pa gcig dpal ldan sgra gcan gyi bskal dru'i re'u mig mkha' me lag pa'i bar du spel ba phug lugs rtsis kyi legs bshad rtsis kyi legs bshad mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan bai Dur dkar po'i do shal spyod ldan snying nor las drag gsum rkang 'dzin dang gzhi gnyis dal dag gi re'u mig lhung grub phun tshogs drag gza' gsum las bkra shis kyi dal dag re'u mig bcur spel ba mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan bkra shis myur ba bla med pa'i 'byung khungs mkhas pa'i phyag len nyi ma bar pa'i nges pas nyi ldog phag zhag sgang dbugs rnams kyi sgrub tshul re'u mig tu bkod pa mkhas pa'i snying nor

Collection of texts on astrological and calendendrical system in Ladakh. At least one of the texts is by Drikung Kagyu master Konchok Trinle Zangpo (1656-1718). Reproduced from manuscripts in the possession of Amchi Tashi Wangyal.
li tho/ le'u tho/ lo tho//
drang ba dang nges pa'i don rnam par 'byed pa'i bstan bcos legs par bshad pa'i snying po'i dgongs pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'i me long
Draṅ ba daṅ ṅes paʾi don rnam par ʾbyed paʾi bstan bcos legs par bśad paʾi sñiṅ poʾi dgoṅs paʾi don gsal bar byed paʾi me loṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Ser-byas Rab-ʾbyams Blo-bzaṅ-dge-legs].
Draṅ ba daṅ ṅes paʾi don rnam par ʾbyed paʾi bstan bcos legs par bśad paʾi sñiṅ poʾi dgoṅs paʾi don gsal bar byed paʾi me loṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Ser-byas Rab-ʾbyams Blo-bzaṅ-dge-legs].
Commentary on the Prajnaparamita by Drati Geshe Lobzang Gelek (18th cent.).
bden gnyis drang don nges don/
blo bzang dge legs/ bra ti dge bshes chung ba blo bzang dge legs, 17uu.
rtsod lan blo dman snying gi gdung sel ga bur thig pa'i spun zla
a refutation of the views of 'jam-mgon 'ju mi-pham-rgya-mtsho in the series of polemical writings on the nature of sunyata and madhyamika philosophy
a refutation of the views of 'jam-mgon 'ju mi-pham-rgya-mtsho in the series of polemical writings on the nature of sunyata and madhyamika philosophy
"reproduced from a print from the 'bras-spuns blo-gsal-glin blocks.".

Polemical writing by Denma Geshe Lobzang Choying (19th cent.) of Drepung Loseling Monastic College. Refutations on the views of Jamgong Ju Mipam Gyatso (1846-1912) on topics such as Madhyamaka philosophy and emptiness.
mi pham rgya mtsho 'ju mi pham rnam rgyal rgya mtsho mi pham rnam rgyal rgya mtsho 'jam mgon mi pham rgya mtsho/
bkra shis sgo mang gi mkhas dbang dag gi gsung deng dus dpe rgyun shin tu dkon pa rnams las 'dir gang byung zhig phyogs bsdus/
Sgo mang dge bshes bskal bzang thabs mkhas,
pod dang po/ (1) pod gnyis pa/ (2)
Collection of rare texts of the sgo mang college of 'bras spungs monastery.
dge lugs pa dga' ldan pa/
gso rig man ngag gces btus rin chen gter mdzod
a treatise on tibetan medical practice containing numerous instructions and formulae
a treatise on tibetan medical practice containing numerous instructions and formulae
Gso rig man ṅag gces btus Rin chen gter mdzod :a treatise on Tibetan medical practice containing numerous instructions and formulae /by Karma-chos-rgyal.

"reproduced from a manuscript from gser-bzan dri-med.".
Treatise on Tibetan medical practices by Karma Chogyel. Reproduced from a manuscript by Serzan Drime.
three texts on the history and practice of the zi-byed and gcod precepts
three texts on the history and practice of the zi-byed and gcod precepts
Gcod kyi chos skor :three texts on the history and practice of the Źi-byed and Gcod precepts.
Gcod kyi chos skor :three texts on the history and practice of the Źi-byed and Gcod precepts.
Contents: ser phyin tshigs bcad chen mo of aryadeva.--phun po gzan skyur gyi rnam bsad.--zi byed dan gcod yul gyi chos 'byun of 'jigs bral chos kyi senge.
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa chen mo phung po gzan skyur gyi rnam bshad gcod kyi don gsal byed zhi byed dang gcod yul gyi chos 'byung rin po che'i phreng ba thar pa'i rgyan
Three 19th century to early 20th century works from central Tibet on the history and practice of zhije and chod.
a collection of mdos and related rituals
a collection of mdos and related rituals
"reproduced from the collection of manuscripts from the library of rgya-ston em-chi by pema lodoe.".

Collected ritual texts by Karma Chakme, founder of the Nedo branch of the Kamtsang Kagyu order, the Nyingma author Lekden Dudjom Dorje (1512- ?) and others. Reproduced from a collection of manuscripts from the library of Gyaton Amchi by Pema Lodro.
karma chags med/ gnas mdo karma chags med, 1613-1678
legs ldan rdo rje// rig 'dzin legs ldan bdud 'joms/, 1512-1625?
las sna tshogs pa'i sngags kyi be'u bum dgos 'dod kun 'byung gter gyi bum pa bzang po/
a rare collection of secret spells and incantations to accomplish various desired results
a rare collection of secret spells and incantations to accomplish various desired results

Las sna tshogs paʾi sṅags kyi beʾu bum dgos ʾdod kun ʾbyuṅ gter gyi bum pa bzaṅ po :a rare collection of secret spells and incantations to accomplish various desired results /by ʾJam-mgon ʾJu Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho.
"reproduced from a manuscript belonging to b. jamyang norbu.".
Collection of tantric ritual instructions written by Ju Mipam Namgyal Gyatso (1846-1912). Reproduced from a manuscript belonging to B. Jamyang Norbu.
mi pham 'jam dbyangs rnam rgyal rgya mtsho/, 1846-1912

texts concerned with the propitiation of avalokitesvara
spyan ras gzigs nan son ran grol
Thugs rje chen po Spyan ras gzigs ṅan soṅ raṅ ʾgrol chos skor :texts concerned with the propitiation of Avalokiteśvara /rediscovered by Rig-ʾdzin ʾjaʾ-tshon-sñiṅ-po.
Reproduced from the manuscript belonging to the ven. drukpa toosay rimpoche.

Cycle of practice devoted to Avalokitesvara in the form of Tukje Chenpo Chenrezik Ngensong Rangdrol. Revealed by the Nyingma treasure revealer Jatson Nyingpo (1585-1656). Reproduced from a manuscript belonging to Drukpa Tukse Rinpoche.
thugs chen ngan song rang grol thugs rje chen po ngan song rang grol ('ja' tshon snying po)/
sgom gyi gnad gsal bar phye ba bsam gtan mig sgron/
a treatise on bhavana and dhyana and the relationships between the various approaches to buddhist contemplative practice
a treatise on bhavana and dhyana and the relationships between the various approaches to buddhist contemplative practice
Reproduced from a manuscript made presumably from an eastern tibetan print by 'khor-gdon gter-sprul 'chi-med-rig-'dzin.

Eighth century treatise on types of Buddhist meditation written by Nubchen Sanggye Yeshe (9th cent.). Reproduced from a manuscript likely made from an eastern Tibetan blockprint by Khordon Tertrul Chime Rigdzin.
sangs rgyas ye shes/ gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes, 8uu.
'bras spungs blo gsal gling dbu ma'i yig cha/
dbu ma'i spyi don zab don gsal ba'i sgron me/
dbu ma la 'jug pa'i brgal lan zab don yang gsal sgron me/
phar phyin dang dbu ma'i spyi thal sogs kyi dogs gnas 'ga' zhig las brtsams pa'i dri lan/
the obligatory texts (yig-cha) for the study of madhyamika at 'bras-spuns blo-gsal-glin
Drepung Losel Ling monastic textbooks focusing on the study of Madhyamaka. Written by Ganden Tripa 15, Paṇchen Sonam Drakpa (1529-1543) with contributions by Geshe Tsultrim Namgyel (20th cent.).
bsod nams grags pa/ paN chen bsod nams grags pa, 1478-1554
tshul khrims rnam rgyal/ dge bshes tshul khrims rnam rgyal, 19uu.
spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron me/
Spyod ba bsdus paʼi sgron me :the Caryāmelāpakapradīpa of Āryadeva in its Tibetan translation by Śraddhākaravarman and Rin-chen-bzaṅ-po, with annotations by an unknown follower of the Gcod tradition.
Reproduced from a manuscript from nepal by tashi dorji.

Tibetan translation of Aryadeva’s (3rd cent.) Caryamelapakapradipa. Translated by Sraddhakavarma (10th cent.) and his student, Rinchen Zangpo (958-1055), a principle translator of the second diffusion of Buddhism in Tibet.
rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur rin po che'i 'bri klog dan 'chad nan byed mkhan rnams la ne bar mkho ba'i yi ge gzan phan rnam dag gi gsal byed me lon
detailed comparisons of the textual variations between the snar-than and urga redactions of the tibetan bka'-'gyur with notesconcerning the co-ne, sde-dge, and beijing red prints
detailed comparisons of the textual variations between the snar-than and urga redactions of the tibetan bka'-'gyur with notesconcerning the co-ne, sde-dge, and beijing red prints
rare buddhist manuscripts from the u.s.s.r. ;
"reproduced from a manuscript presented by the ven. tanpai nyima of the ribo gegye geden phuntsokling datshang of buryat a.s.s.r.".

Detailed comparative analysis between the Tibetan Nartang and Mongolia Khure editions of the Kangyur. Contains notes specifically concerning Chonne, Degge, and Beijing red prints. Reproduced from a manuscript of Venerable Tenpai Nyima of the Riwo Gegye Geden Puntsok Ling Dratsang in Buryatia, Russia.
